Package com.camerontec.catalys.server.adapter.jdbc

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IConnectionFacet
    Interface providing limited access to the functionality provided by a Connection.
    IDBFieldInfoReader
    An interface to allow different field information sources
    IFieldData
    An interface to a database field attributes store
    IFieldDataSet
    An interface to a structure that holds IFieldData objects
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DBFieldReader
    IDBFieldInfoReader implementation.
    DefaultJdbcApplicationReader
    Default JDBC implementation of the IPeerApplicationReader interface.
    DefaultJdbcApplicationWriter
    Default JDBC implementation of the IPeerApplicationWriter interface.
    FieldData
    An implementation of IFieldData.
    FieldDataSet
    An implementation of IFieldDataSet.
    FieldValueInfo
    Transformers are expected to place field values in this value holder class The sql type should be provided, necessary to overcome some jdbc drivers issue of not supporting setObject with null values.
    FlexibleTagTransformer
    A transformer class to construct FIX messages out of database fields and vice-versa using the tags specified by the user.
    JdbcAdapter
    This adapter facilitates messages exchange between a JDBC enabled database and Catalys.
    JdbcPeerApplicationBase
    Base class for default JDBC implementations of IPeerApplicationWriter and IPeerApplicationReader.
    JdbcTypeMappings
    A helper class that holds the mapping between Jdbc data types to Java types according to the specification
